item.title: Git Aliases
item.description: Git is great, but creating some git aliases is a great way to make your usages even more efficient. To add any of these you can either copy and paste into the [alias] section of your .gitconfig file or run git config --global alias.NAME 'COMMAND' replacing NAME with the alias to use, and COMMAND with what to run. So without further ado, here are the ones I have created and use on a very regular basis.
